&#3906;&#3919;&#3928;: [1037] ... 1) brjod pa'am skad cha/ ... snying gtam/ ... gsang gtam/ ... blun gtam/ ... tshoD gtam/ ... dpyad gtam/ ... gtam sngog pa/ ... gzhan gyi gtam la rna ba gtad de nyon/ ... bu skyes pa la ming/ chang drangs pa la gtam/ ... mi rnams thams cad phyug po'i bu la dga'/ gtam rnams thams cad 'dod pa'i phyogs su 'gro/ ... pho rog sha khyer lung pa'i phu dang/ sprang po gtam khyer lung pa'i mda'/ ... mi khom pa brgyad kyi gtam/ ... 2) ming graD/ ... ro sa 'og tu song yang/ gtam sa steng du sdod/ ...
